          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kaj počne?</string>
            <string language="en">What is he doing?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was tut er?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que fait-il ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que está fazendo?</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι κάνει;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué él está haciendo?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Naloga pomaga pri spoznavanju in uporabi besed, ki ponazarjajo gibanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Matching the activities to the correct pictures.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenbringen der Aktivitäten zu den korrekten 
Abbildungen.</string>

          </description>
